channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Site Reviews
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Site Reviews

item.title: CVE-2023-1525|2024-08-02T05:49:11.672Z -- unknown -- site%20reviews
item.description: The Site Reviews WordPress plugin before 6.7.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).

item.title: CVE-2024-3050|2024-08-01T19:32:42.587Z -- unknown -- site%20reviews
item.description: The Site Reviews WordPress plugin before 7.0.0 retrieves client IP addresses from potentially untrusted headers, allowing an attacker to manipulate its value. This may be used to bypass IP-based blocking

item.title: CVE-2024-3050|2024-06-04T17:31:26.567Z -- unknown -- site%20reviews
item.description: The Site Reviews WordPress plugin before 7.0.0 retrieves client IP addresses from potentially untrusted headers, allowing an attacker to manipulate its value. This may be used to bypass IP-based blocking
